title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with a mix of colorful vegetables, served with rice or noodles.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender beef pieces in a creamy mushroom sauce, served with egg noodles or rice.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and a drizzle of olive oil.

title: Sushi Rolls
summary: Japanese sushi rolls made with vinegared rice, seaweed, and a variety of fillings such as fish, vegetables, or avocado.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: A decadent dessert with a molten chocolate center, perfect for a special treat.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A crispy salad with romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and a creamy Caesar dressing.
